Title: Concerns as 10 MDAs budget N24 billion for software this year
Summary: Software developers have expressed concern over continued patronage of foreign software by ministries, departments and agencies . 10 MDAs budget N24 billion for software this year .

Title: Ex-SSG alleges Katsina LG budgets N300m to pay bandits
Summary: Ex-SSG alleges Katsina LG budgets N300m to pay bandits . A chieftain of the African Democratic Congress (ADC) in Katsina State, Dr Mustapha Inuwa, claims one of the local councils .

Title: Dangote assures Nigerians of price stability, listing of refinery stocks
Summary: Dangote Refinery has achieved 50 million litres of Premium Motor Spirit (PMS), also known as petrol, daily, supported by a 24-hour loading .

Title: Nigeria’s oil production falters as FG sets terms for bid round, licences
Summary: Nigeria’s crude oil production slipped in December, underperforming several Organisation of Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) peers at a rate of less than one per cent .

Title: Ambassadors’ absence, ‘desperation’ expose FG’s $9m lobbying in U.S.

Title: Alaafin ‘handshake snub’ not intentional — Olubadan
Summary: Olubadan of Ibadan land, Oba Rashidi Ladoja, dismissed insinuations that he deliberately snubbed the Alaafin of Oyo . Oba Akeem Owoade said the incident was neither intentional nor disrespectful .

Title: AFRIMA not about giving awards — Dada
Summary: The President and Executive Producer of the All Africa Music Awards, AFRIMA, Mr Mike Dada, noted that the event proved why it is regarded as Africa’s biggest music awards platform .

Title: 60 Years After: Remembering the bloody coup that changed Nigeria forever
Summary: The Brigadier-General and his pregnant wife were both gunned down . She was said to have stood in front of her husband, pleading for mercy .

Title: Economic reforms create opportunities despite short-term pains — Akabueze
Summary: Pastor Ben Akabueze, former Director-General of the Budget Office of the Federation, said reforms were painful in the short term . He said reforms are laying the foundation for sustainable growth and long-term investment opportunities . RCCG Economic Summit targets clarity on reforms, investments, he said .

Title: AFCON 2025: Peter Obi, Omokri hail Super Eagles after semi-final loss
Summary: Labour Party presidential candidate in the 2023 election, Peter Obi, and a former presidential aide, Reno Omokri, have commended the Super Eagles for their performance at the 2025 Africa Cup of Nations . Nigeria lost 4–2 on penalties to the host nation after a goalless draw over regulation time and extra time on Wednesday .

Title: Fans slam ref Laryea for poor officiating
Summary: Nigerian football fans have criticised Ghanaian referee Daniel Laryea for what they described as biased and poor officiating during the Super Eagles’ semi-final defeat to Morocco on Wednesday night . Title: Defection: Kwankwaso, Yusuf disagree over alleged coercion of Kano officials
Summary: Senator Rabiu Kwankwaso accuses Governor Abba Yusuf of forcing state officials and elected local government chairmen to sign documents indicating their defection from the New Nigeria People’s Party to the All Progressives Congress . Summary: The TUC described the directive as unacceptable, provocative and a violation of established industrial relations principles . Title: Aregbesola’s ex-aide, others return to APC, back Oyebamiji
Summary: Members of the Blue Movement, one of the political groups associated with former Osun State governor, Rauf Aregbesola, have returned to the All Progressives Congress in the state .
